law.catch_line: The purposes of the Program are to:...

text.section:
The purposes of the Program are to:
provide funding to assist emergency food providers in purchasing food for needy individuals;
encourage needy individuals to become self-sufficient; and
distribute information on the State's earned income tax credit established under § 10-704 of the Tax - General Article.
When feasible and cost effective, food purchased under the Program shall be produced, grown, and harvested in the State.
